name: EmotionalState
description:
Welcome to the Emotional State.

You play as Jayce, a young street punk who finds himself trapped within his own dreams.
Jayce must overcome his negative emotions in order to find inner peace...

The dreamworld of Emotional State is grounded in his hometown of "Neon City" - an 80's style retro city with a twist.

Jayce's cognition has warped the city into his own vision of Neon City.

Discover what Jayce struggles against, and the past that haunts him. Help Jayce to discover the truth, and gain acceptance of his emotions!

Controls:

Xbox One Controller:

  • A - Light Punch
  • B - Heavy Punch
  • Y - Ability
  • Analog Stick - Movement
  • Menu Button - Pause

Keyboard & Mouse:

  • Left Mouse Button - Light Punch
  • Right Mouse Button - Heavy Punch
  • WASD - Movement
  • Escape - Pause
